MentalStateDef.label: Madness
MentalStateDef.beginLetter: {PAWN_nameDef} has lost the last connection to {PAWN_possessive} former self. {PAWN_possessive} regard for health, family, friendship, and love has been shattered by continuous exposure to the dark, corrupting psychic forces of the void.\n\n{PAWN_pronoun} will now enter a severe period of madness for several days as {PAWN_pronoun} struggles with {PAWN_possessive} altered mental state and the grim realization of the deepening nightmare. While there's a chance {PAWN_pronoun} might overcome this crisis and restore {PAWN_possessive} sanity, it's far more likely that {PAWN_pronoun} will be completely inhumanized.
